1:0-1:4: ENUM_DEF :: `enum E : u32 {
  A = 42,
}` :: E
1:5-1:6: NAME_DEF :: `E` :: E
1:9-1:12: TYPE_ANNOTATION :: `u32` :: uN[32]
1:15-1:16: NAME_DEF :: `A` :: E
1:19-1:21: NUMBER :: `42` :: uN[32]
2:0-2:20: FUNCTION :: `fn f() -> E {
  E::A
}` :: () -> E
2:3-2:4: NAME_DEF :: `f` :: () -> E
2:10-2:11: TYPE_REF :: `E` :: E
2:10-2:12: TYPE_ANNOTATION :: `E` :: E
2:12-2:20: BLOCK :: `{
  E::A
}` :: E
2:15-2:18: COLON_REF :: `E::A` :: E
2:15-2:18: STATEMENT :: `E::A` :: E
